virality_potential.justification: The provocative humor comparing human anatomy to a public figure's sensitivity has high shareability in crypto communities.

informative_value.justification: Contains no factual information beyond a crude joke with no educational value.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Negative sentiment directed at @IOHK_Charles through sarcastic comparison.

duration_of_impact.justification: Meme-style content likely to lose relevance within days as humor becomes dated.

duration_of_impact.justification: Core infrastructure updates remain relevant for months during implementation phases.
